TITLE: Extracurricular
DEF: Structured scholarly, social, or cultural activities outside of formal education
TASK: The Extracurricular Activities pattern contribute to non-academic pursuits that enrich the educational experience. It aims to develop interpersonal skills and cultivate a sense of community. Improve EXCUR by offering a wide range of activities, encouraging student involvement, and endorsing inclusivity. AI can assist in managing these activities and tracking student participation.
